titles.title: Office of Rural Affairs Enhancement Act
Office of Rural Affairs Enhancement Act
Office of Rural Affairs Enhancement Act
To amend the Small Business Act to clarify the responsibilities of the Office of Rural Affairs of the Small Business Administration, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported by the Yeas and Nays: 23 - 0.
Reported by the Committee on Small Business. H. Rept. 119-225.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 183.

committee.name: House Small Business
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To
